articles.author: Belinda Palmada
articles.title: $1 billion shock hits crypto investors - news.com.au
articles.description: Around 46,000 Americans have lost over $1 billion in cryptocurrency scams since the start of 2021, according to a report by the Federal Trade Commission (FTC).
articles.content: More than 46,000 people in the US have reported they lost over $1 billion in crypto-linked fraud since the beginning of 2021.Around 46,000 Americans have lost over $1 billion in cryptocurrency scams … [+2748 chars]
